amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $10 million appropriated for a District of Columbia scholarship program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the section of the bill that provides $10 million to fund a school voucher program in the District.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 203 (Roll no. 479).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Norton.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 203 (Roll no. 479).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
